Govt motion to dismiss cnts 1,3, &; 4 of the superseding indictment is granted. No fine imposed. Special Assessment of $100 due immed. Court recommends deft be placed at a facility near Mexico, i.e. La Tuna. Deft is remanded to custody of the USM for imposition of sentence. Julie Churchill, Court Reporter (2s)

charges.charge_disposition: deft is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP to be imprisoned for a term of eight (8) months, to be served at Reality House, 405 East Washington, Brownsville, Texas. Upon release from imprisonment, the deft is placed on Supervised Release for a term of 3 years. Deft shall be placed on home detention for a period of 8 months, to commence w/in 30 days of release from imprisonment. Special assessment of $100.00 due immed. No fine imposed. Deft is to report for imposition of sentence on January 7, 1998. (3s)
